entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Freezing rain along the Ottawa River. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
